description:
A fallen lord sacrifices his prized possessions for a traveling monk.  A princess is found in a stalk of bamboo.  A priest tricks a fox, and finds himself confronted by the lost souls of hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hachi no Ki / Kaguya-hime / Ogyousama to Kitsune
The Tree in the Pot / Princess Kaguya / The Monk and the Fox
鉢の木 / かぐや姫 / お行さまと狐
